document_data.mainbody:
ouse Torgh was a drow house of Menzoberranzan in the late 14 and late 15 centuries DR.
Originally a commoner family when its daughter Trisstree rose to a degree of power as a priestess and an Arach-Tinilith instructor by 1372 DR, it had become the 16 ranked house by 1480 DR.
* Trisstree Torgh Instructor at Arach-Tinilith in 1372 DR
